title: dayavODu endan
sahitya:
dayavODu endan tuyarODak-kandanE tandiDu abhayam cintai kanindu nI


anupallavi

  tuyarODu padaittut-tuDikkum hrdayam ayarAmal aDiyEnai aNaiyum tuNaiyAgi


caraNam    enna kAraNam tAn enruNara oNNAdu innal memmEl tunbamurap-paNNudE
ten pazhankk-unnai tEDi vandiTTa nAn ninnaruL peravum nimmati uravum
